location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Thomas White, Military Paymaster General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a list of bills transmitted to Bombay from the Bushire Residency with dates, along with a list of drafts that cannot be found, in response to communications dated 24 March, and 31 July 1812.There is no signature to the letter, but it is in all probabilty written by William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire.
